Encoding = UTF-8

*GTD.BrokenHttpLinksCheckers
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type;      URL;                                               Head_Status_Code; Get_Status_Code ; Redirect_Header_Location
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LOCAL;     https://localhost/fail;                            400             ; -               ; empty
LOCAL;     http://localhost/success;                          200             ; -               ; empty
NUMERIC;   http://127.0.0.1/success;                          200             ; -               ; empty
NUMERIC;   http://172.217.30.9/google;                        200             ; -               ; empty
NORMAL;    https://github.com/uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 200             ; 201             ; empty
NORMAL;    https://github.com/uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 307             ; -               ; https://github.com/uniqueck/htmlSanityCheck
NORMAL;    https://github.com/uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 307             ; -               ; empty
NORMAL;    https://github.com/uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 404             ; 301             ; empty
NORMAL;    https://github.com/uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 309             ; 402             ; empty
NORMAL;    https://github.com/uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 403             ; 500             ; empty
NORMAL;    https://github.com/uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 403             ; 200             ; empty
NORMAL;    https://github.com/uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 403             ; 309             ; empty

*Gtd.HttpStatusCodes
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Cat;         Configure_Status_Code_Range ; Filter
-------------------------------------------------------
SUCCESS;     200,201,203                 ; '\(200;201;203)'
WARN;        301,302                     ; '\(301;302)'
WARN;        309,310                     ; '\(309;310)'
ERROR;       401,402,403                 ; '\(401;402;403)'
